title: PersonalExpenses-app
description: A Flutter-based application designed to record, track, and visualize daily expenses.

title: FintechPayments Analytics Platform
description: End-to-End analytics engineering project that ingest raw payment data into Snowflake, transform it using dbt, and delivers KPI-driven executive dashboard in Tableau.

title: GLPI IT Operation Analytics
